casebody.data:
Cathy ZAHN and Robert Zahn
v.
Akelia A. WATKINS, Metropolitan Property and Casualty Insurance Company and State Farm Mutual Automobile Insurance Company, et al. 2018-CC-0337 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 6, 2019 ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE FIRST JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF CADDO Writ denied. CRICHTON, J., additionally concurs and assigns reasons. Crichton, J., additionally concurs and assigns reasons. Circumstances unique to this case give rise to a genuine issue of material fact and therefore, in my view, the decisions of the lower court are correct. See La. C. Civ. P. art 966(c) and Maggio v. Parker , 17-1112 (La. 6/27/18), 250 So.3d 874 .
